name: M&M Icebreaker
description: The M&M Icebreaker is a fun and tasty way to get to know people. Each color of M&M corresponds to a different question or topic.
equipment: A list of questions corresponding to each color of M&M
basicRules: Pass the bag of M&Ms around and tell everyone to take as many as they want.
Once everyone has their M&Ms, reveal the list of questions for each color.
For each M&M they took, each person has to answer the question corresponding to its color.
For example, red could be 'your favorite hobby', green could be 'your favorite food', yellow could be 'your favorite movie', etc.
Each person takes a turn to share their answers with the group.
tips: Make the questions fun and interesting.
You can use other types of candy with different colors as well.
This game is a great way to get people talking and sharing about themselves.
